title: Storytelling for Today's Climate
itunes:title: Storytelling for Today's Climate
description:
Anna Jane Joyner, Founder and Director of Good Energy, discusses developing a Playbook for Screenwriting in the Age of Climate Change.Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
